1.0.name: wordpress/wp-opensearch
1.0.description:
Add OpenSearch standard support for search clients to your website implementing the OpenSearch Specification 1.1.

This plugin also adds optional support for search engine word suggestions, retrieved from the tags used in your website.

The autodiscovery feature embeds a link to the OpenSearch Description (OSD) into the head code of your website, allowing the automatic detection for the clients that implement the same standard (e.g. Mozilla Firefox search bar).
